document_data.name: Fior Botpur
document_data.mainbody: '''Fior Botpur''' was one of the elected [[Three Lords of Hlath]] in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Lord Botpur ruled the city together with Lord [[Warkas]] and Lord [[Nybahn]].
document_data.History: In 1358 DR, during an absence of both his colleagues, it was reported to Lord Botpur that a barbarian army from [[Kara-Tur]] threatened the city. Quickly he gathered all the prominent citizens to discuss the matter. Botpur wanted to hire an adventuring party for an exploration mission.
